description: This file defines a Redux slice for authentication state management in a React application using Redux Toolkit. It includes initial state, reducers for handling authentication actions, and exports for actions and reducer.

methods.name: startAuth
methods.description: Sets the auth status to 'loading' and clears errors to initiate authentication process.

methods.name: authSuccess
methods.description: Updates state with user and token data upon successful authentication and sets status to 'succeeded'.

methods.name: authFailure
methods.description: Sets authentication status to 'failed' and records an error message on failure.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Resets auth state to initial values, logging out the user.
